title: mapUniqueKeyOnly=true silently ignores field mapping params f=.. when indexing custom JSON
description:
since SOLR-6633 most of published JSON examples doesn't work in techproducts exmple, it provides unpleasant user experience.
see comment 1 and comment 2 

It's proposed to explicitly throw an error if mapUniqueKeyOnly=true and f=.. are supplied, like it's done now with srcField=.. and split=.. : "msg":"Raw data can be stored only if split=/","code":400,
